concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 莱尼（人名)

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a given name or nickname, often a diminutive form of Leonard or other names beginning with 'Len-'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作人名或昵称，常为 Leonard 或其他以 'Len-' 开头的名字的昵称形式。
definitions.example_en: Lenny was the most enthusiastic member of the team, always ready with a joke.
definitions.example_cn: 莱尼是团队中最热情的成员，总是准备好讲个笑话。
